H0.text: Bleach is an example of an acidic solution.

H1.text: Vinegar is an example of an acidic solution.

H2.text: Sugar water is an example of an acidic solution.

H3.text: Salt water is an example of an acidic solution.

A4.text: Vinegar is an odorous aqueous solution of diluted acetic acid and trace compounds that may include flavorings or naturally occurring organic compounds.

A5.text: Vinegar typically contains from 4% to 18% acetic acid by volume.
